data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Davao del Sur. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Davao del Sur, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 88,120 believers find a person of peace today among the 544,481 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary: On average, 32 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Davao del Sur, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Davao del Sur, Philippines to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Davao del Sur, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, 0.5% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, encourage the 88,120 believers in Davao del Sur to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 88,120 believers in Davao del Sur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Davao del Sur, Philippines.
